data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 45,086 believers in the state of Prahova into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Prahova, Romania
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Prahova, Romania. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, of the 622,024 people in the state of Prahova who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Prahova, Romania to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Azerbaijani people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, convict the 45,086 believers in Prahova to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Father, remind your church in Prahova that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Prahova, Romania to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

location.name: Prahova
location.people_groups_list: Bashkir, Tajik, Turk, Jew, Eastern Yiddish-speaking, Czech
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Bashkir (600), Tajik (600), Turk (1,900), Jew, Eastern Yiddish-speaking (600), Czech (2,200)
